alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:51PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Otero, northeastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 850 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North La Junta to 8 miles south of Timpas. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding is possible. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Higbee and Timpas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
